dataGroup.data: A Full-HD Camcorder with Twin Camera, Intelligent 90x Zoom, and New Optical Image Stabilizer
Catch Both the Family and a Selfie with Twin Camera
Twin Camera makes it more fun to capture memories. With its sub-camera, this camcorder preserves precious family moments, and even fits the person who is shooting into the picture.
Double your fun with unique footage
2.20 megapixels [16:9] (O.I.S. Standard Mode, Level Shot Function OFF)
Panasonic Lens f=2.06 - 103 mm (28.0 – 1740 mm [16:9] in 35mm equiv.)
5-axis HYBRID O.I.S.+ with Active Mode, Auto O.I.S. Lock, Level Shot Function
Sub Camera, Wireless Multi Camera, HDR Movie, Creative Control
2.20 megapixels [16:9] (O.I.S. Standard Mode, Level Shot Function OFF)
28.0 - 1740 mm [16:9] (O.I.S. Standard Mode, Level Shot Function OFF)
4 lx (Scene Mode Low Light 1/25), 1 lx (Night Mode (Color))
62x (O.I.S. Standard Mode, Level Shot Function OFF)
90x (O.I.S. Standard Mode, Level Shot Function: OFF)
150x / 3000x (The maximum value of zoom magnification can be set in two patterns)
Auto / White Set / Sunny / Cloudy / Indoor1 / Indoor2
HYBRID O.I.S.+ with Active Mode, Auto O.I.S. Lock, Level Shot Function
Miniature Effect, Silent Movie, 8mm Movie, Time Lapse Rec
